entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 3 except 8 inland. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this morning. High plus 3 except 8 inland. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low zero.

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High 6.
